originContent: # iOS Simulator Skill for Claude Code
translatedContent: # iOS 模拟器技能用于 Claude 代码

originContent: Production-ready automation for iOS app testing and building. 21 scripts optimized for both human developers and AI agents.
translatedContent: 面向生产的 iOS 应用测试和构建自动化。21 个脚本，针对人类开发者和 AI 代理进行了优化。

originContent: This is basically a Skill version of my XCode MCP: [https://github.com/conorluddy/xc-mcp](https://github.com/conorluddy/xc-mcp)
translatedContent: 这基本上是我的 XCode MCP 的技能版本：[https://github.com/conorluddy/xc-mcp](https://github.com/conorluddy/xc-mcp)

originContent: MCPs load a lot of tokens into the context window when they're active, but also seem to work really well. Skills don't load in any context. I'll make a plugin next and try to find the balance...
translatedContent: MCP 在激活时会加载大量令牌到上下文窗口，但似乎效果非常好。技能则不加载任何上下文。我接下来会制作一个插件，尝试找到平衡点……

originContent: Updated: The Plugin version lets you easily disable MCPs for different tool groups. Optimise your context window by only enabling the tools you're actively using, such as xcodebuild: [https://github.com/conorluddy/xclaude-plugin](https://github.com/conorluddy/xclaude-plugin)
translatedContent: 更新：插件版本让你可以轻松禁用不同工具组的 MCP。通过只启用你正在使用的工具（如 xcodebuild）来优化你的上下文窗口：[https://github.com/conorluddy/xclaude-plugin](https://github.com/conorluddy/xclaude-plugin)

originContent: Instead of pixel-based navigation that breaks when UI changes:
translatedContent: 它不是基于像素的导航，那种导航在 UI 改变时会失效：

originContent: Uses semantic navigation on accessibility APIs to interact with elements by their meaning, not coordinates. Works across different screen sizes and survives UI redesigns.
translatedContent: 使用无障碍 API 上的语义导航，通过元素的含义而非坐标进行交互。适用于不同屏幕尺寸，并能适应 UI 重设计。

originContent: - **21 production scripts** for building, testing, and automation
translatedContent: - **21 个生产脚本** 用于构建、测试和自动化

originContent: - **Semantic navigation** - find elements by text, type, or ID
translatedContent: - **语义导航** - 通过文本、类型或 ID 查找元素

originContent: - **Token optimized** - 96% reduction vs raw tools (3-5 lines default)
translatedContent: - **令牌优化** - 相比原始工具减少 96%（默认 3-5 行）

originContent: - **Zero configuration** - works immediately on macOS with Xcode
translatedContent: - **零配置** - 在 macOS 上配合 Xcode 即可使用

originContent: - **Structured output** - JSON and formatted text, easy to parse
translatedContent: - **结构化输出** - JSON 和格式化文本，易于解析

originContent: - **Auto-UDID detection** - no need to specify device each time
translatedContent: - **自动 UDID 检测** - 无需每次指定设备

originContent: - **Batch operations** - boot, delete, erase multiple simulators at once
translatedContent: - **批量操作** - 一次启动、删除、擦除多个模拟器

originContent: - **Comprehensive testing** - WCAG compliance, visual diffs, accessibility audits
translatedContent: - **全面测试** - WCAG 合规性、视觉差异、无障碍审核

originContent: - **CI/CD ready** - JSON output, exit codes, automated device lifecycle
translatedContent: - **CI/CD 准备** - JSON 输出、退出码、自动设备生命周期
### 作为 Claude 代码技能
重新启动 Claude Code。该技能会自动加载。

originContent: Restart Claude Code. The skill loads automatically.
- IDB (optional, for interactive features: `brew tap facebook/fb && brew install idb-companion`)
translatedContent: - IDB（可选，用于交互功能：`brew tap facebook/fb && brew install idb-companion`）
- **build_and_test.py** - 构建项目，运行测试，解析结果

originContent: - **build_and_test.py** - Build projects, run tests, parse results

translatedContent: 详见 **SKILL.md** 获取完整参考。
## 与 Claude Code 的工作方式

originContent: ## How It Works with Claude Code

translatedContent: Claude Code 会根据您的请求自动检测何时使用此技能。您无需手动调用。

originContent: Claude Code automatically detects when to use this skill based on your request. You don't need to manually invoke it.
You: "Set up my iOS app for testing"
translatedContent: You: "Set up my iOS app for testing"

originContent: Claude: [Uses navigator.py to find and tap]
translatedContent: Claude: [Uses navigator.py to find and tap]

originContent: You: "Check if the form is accessible"
translatedContent: You: "Check if the form is accessible"
你也可以在需要时手动运行脚本。

originContent: You can also run scripts manually when needed.

translatedContent: ### 示例 5：CI/CD 中的设备生命周期

originContent: **Semantic Navigation**: Find elements by meaning (text, type, ID) not pixel coordinates. Survives UI changes and works across device sizes.
translatedContent: **语义导航**：通过含义（文本、类型、ID）查找元素，而非像素坐标。能适应UI变化，支持不同设备尺寸。

originContent: **Token Efficiency**: Default output is 3-5 lines. Use `--verbose` for details or `--json` for machine parsing. 96% reduction vs raw tools.
translatedContent: **令牌效率**：默认输出3-5行。使用`--verbose`获取详细信息，或`--json`供机器解析。相比原始工具减少96%。

originContent: **Accessibility-First**: Built on iOS accessibility APIs for reliability. Better for users with accessibility needs and more robust for automation.
translatedContent: **无障碍优先**：基于iOS无障碍API构建，可靠性高。对有无障碍需求的用户友好，自动化更稳健。

originContent: **Zero Configuration**: Works immediately on any macOS with Xcode. No complex setup, no configuration files.
translatedContent: **零配置**：在任意安装Xcode的macOS上即刻可用。无复杂设置，无配置文件。

originContent: **Structured Data**: Scripts output JSON or formatted text, not raw logs. Easy to parse, integrate, and understand.
translatedContent: **结构化数据**：脚本输出JSON或格式化文本，而非原始日志。便于解析、集成和理解。

originContent: **Auto-Learning**: Build system learns your device preference and remembers it for next time.
translatedContent: **自动学习**：构建系统学习设备偏好并记忆，下次自动应用。

originContent: - **SKILL.md** - Complete script reference and table of contents
All scripts minimize output by default:
translatedContent: 所有脚本默认最小化输出：

originContent: | Task | Raw Tools | This Skill | Savings |
translatedContent: | 任务 | 原始工具 | 本技能 | 节省比例 |
| 查找并点击按钮 | 100+ 行 | 1 行 | 99% |

originContent: This efficiency keeps AI agent conversations focused and cost-effective.
translatedContent: 此效率保持 AI 代理对话的集中和成本效益。

originContent: # Checks: macOS, Xcode, simctl, IDB, Python, simulators, packages
translatedContent: # Checks: macOS, Xcode, simctl, IDB, Python, simulators, packages

originContent: # Use verbose mode to see all elements
translatedContent: # Use verbose mode to see all elements
- 保持令牌效率（最小默认输出）

originContent: - Pass Black formatter and Ruff linter
translatedContent: - 通过 Black 格式化和 Ruff 代码检查

originContent: MIT License - Allows commercial use and distribution.
translatedContent: MIT 许可证 - 允许商业使用和分发。

originContent: - **Issues**: Create GitHub issue with reproduction steps
translatedContent: - **问题**：创建带有重现步骤的 GitHub 问题

originContent: **Built for AI agents. Optimized for developers.**
translatedContent: **为 AI 代理构建。为开发者优化。**
